channel.title: Having the server make a directory?
channel.description: Well, in allstar, if anyone has ever used it before. They know it has like 4 files per character. Instead of it saving all those across 4 folders or what ever. I wanted to make it so it would create 1 folder per user, and save all 4 files in that. Anyone know how to have the buffered writer do that?

item.title: Having the server make a directory?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461

Well, in allstar, if anyone has ever used it before. They know it has like 4 files per character. Instead of it saving all those across 4 folders or what ever.
